content.name: select_disclaimer
content.label: Do you accept the above Legal Disclaimer

content.name: html_acceptError
content.content: The legal Disclaimer must be accepted to use this application

content.name: html_AandEStatement
content.content:
A&E Statement

Please note that self-referrals are for mild to moderate anxiety and depression and cannot provide an urgent/emergency service. If you feel you are at risk of harming yourself or others please contact your GP or attend the nearest A&E department or call 999 as a matter of urgency.

content.label: If No is it for a family member who has agreed to you making a referral on their behalf?

content.name: html_onbehalfError
